original_text: The sleep of a labouring man is sweet, whether he eat little or much: but the abundance of the rich will not suffer him to sleep.
korean_text: 노동자는 먹는 것이 많든지 적든지 잠을 달게 자거니와 부자는 그 부요함 때문에 자지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: The sleep of a labouring man is sweet
whether he eat little or much
but the abundance of the rich
will not suffer him to sleep
